column1: Built Environment: Environmental Design and Engineering MSc
column3: Institute for Environmental Design and Engineering
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThere is an urgent need for more sustainable, efficient and healthier buildings to mitigate the impacts of climate change and contribute towards achieving net zero carbon targets. UCL's Environmental Design and Engineering MSc teaches a new generation of experts to apply innovative and sustainable approaches for more efficient building design and operation through integrated design and engineering.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
